name: Sokocat - Islands
description:
Solve 50 challenges inspired by the classic Sokoban puzzle in a totally immersive and relaxing environment, push boxes to complete each level. You will have to use the environment by activating bridges and platforms or use boxes to create bridges. Hey, remember, you can only push one box at a time and you can't pull it. Have fun!


• Simple and intuitive gameplay.
• Peaceful and relaxing environment.
• 50 challenges from easy to difficult.
• More than 50 Achievements
• Control a fluffy cat.
